name: Planning Poker
excerpt: A web app for hosting sprint planning pointing sessions for .
description: This planning poker app uses Next.js, React, and websockets to provide a real-time and interactive experience for sprint planning pointing sessions.
features: Create a planning poker session and have your team join with a unique url
Real-time updates to the session as users join and vote using websockets
Choose from various pointing decks (Fibonacci, T-Shirt, etc.)
